short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Shorts button and avoid clicking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever accidentally clicked on the Shorts button on the left side of YouTube and wasted your time? 

If so, this extension will be helpful. It hides the Shorts button on the left side of YouTube. 

No more getting distracted by Shorts! Let's focus on our tasks!
